pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Skills Network Python LibraryA library for working with [Skills Network](https://skills.network) Python labs. - [Documentation](https://ibm-skills-network.github.io/skillsnetwork-python-library/)### Environment Variables(Required environment variables for testing)- `CV_STUDIO_TOKEN`- `CV_STUDIO_BASE_URL`- `IBMCLOUD_API_KEY`## ContributingPlease see [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/ibm-skills-network/skillsnetwork-python-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
